item.title: Cloud Security Engineer (Azure/AWS)
item.description:
Cloud Security Engineer (Azure/AWS)

Are you a security-minded professional with expertise in cloud security architectures? Do you have a passion for protecting critical infrastructure against threats? Looking for a role where you implement security by design? Then we’re looking for you!

item.title: Cloud Solutions Architect (Azure/AWS)
item.description:
Cloud Solutions Architect (Azure/AWS)

Are you an experienced architect with a vision for designing scalable, secure, and cost-effective cloud solutions? Do you have deep knowledge of Azure and AWS? Looking for a senior role where you drive impactful transformations? Then we’re looking for you!

item.title: Platform Engineer (Kubernetes/Cloud Native)
item.description:
Platform Engineer (Kubernetes/Cloud Native)

Are you a technically strong engineer with deep expertise in containerization and cloud-native architectures? Looking for a role where you design and implement microservices ecosystems at scale? Then we’re looking for you!

item.title: DevOps engineer (Azure/AWS)
item.description:
DevOps engineer (Azure/AWS)

Are you a creative doer who enjoys developing applications and setting up infrastructures? Do you have experience with DevOps and knowledge of Azure/AWS or other cloud technologies? Looking for a challenge where you have the freedom of self-employment and the security of a permanent contract? Then you’re the DevOps engineer we’re looking for!
